SEARCH

Uses of Package
model

Packages that use model
Package
Description
controler
Contains the classes that take care of mouse and keyboard inputs.
model
Core data models and logic for representing the game elements, including hexagons, resources, buildings, roads, and their interactions.
model.bots
Classes that represent the bots that will be used in the game, and how they will interact with the game.
model.buildings
Contains the classes that represent the buildings in the game, such as settlements, cities, roads and harbors.
model.tiles
The classes that represent the tiles of the game, and what the tiles can contain.
network
Contains classes that make different players communicate with each other, using the same network.
others
Contains classes that are not directly related to the main functionality of the application.
view
Contains the classes that are responsible for what the user sees on the screen.
view.gamepanels
All the different panels the player can see and interact with during the game.
view.menu
The classes that are used to make the visual aspect of the menu.
